author: A_Brickset_user
title: Bricks Bricks Bricks
review: Just what (I)my daughter wanted, lots of bricks to build with. Now we can build till we drop, only roblem is, the more bricks you own, the bigger the projects, the more bricks you want. Just gotta love Lego. But this box delivers just what it promises, LOTS OF BRICKS. We bought two boxes, being beginners, but box number three is on its way. Now if just the ceilling was a bit hihger!
